医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：斯科特斯暂时拒绝堕胎药挑战最高法院一致驳回了对美国食品和药物管理局对堕胎药米非司酮的批准和规则的质疑，认为提起诉讼的反堕胎医生组织缺乏这样做的资格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-rejects-abortion-pill-challenge-e28094-for-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-rejects-abortion-pill-challenge-e28094-for-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22663a18-85d1-44a5-8d7c-da3ed90b3b94 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 15:50:20 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': SCOTUS rejects abortion pill challenge — for now
研究揭示儿童 DIPG 肿瘤机制密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员距离了解儿童 DIPG 肿瘤的工作原理又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-sheds-light-on-pediatric-DIPG-tumor-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-sheds-light-on-pediatric-DIPG-tumor-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830b196c-4158-42ba-8d6c-100b0c148679 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 14:05:00 -0400 Study sheds light on pediatric DIPG tumor mechanisms
研究提倡在 TBI 重症监护中自由输血严重脑外伤后增加输血可以帮助重症监护病房住院的患者恢复更大的功能独立性和更好的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-advocates-for-liberal-blood-transfusions-in-TBI-intense-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-advocates-for-liberal-blood-transfusions-in-TBI-intense-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1712253f-f853-47c5-82af-643e66680063 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:58:00 -0400 Study advocates for liberal blood transfusions in TBI intensive care
加州大学圣地亚哥分校利用人工智能应对阿片类药物危机的倡议阿片类药物是一类广泛的有效止痛药物，对某些人来说可能会高度成瘾。据政府消息来源称，全世界有近 4000 万人对非法药物上瘾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/UC-San-Diegos-initiative-for-combating-the-opioid-crisis-with-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/UC-San-Diegos-initiative-for-combating-the-opioid-crisis-with-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c8f8da6-68c1-4d57-9fb7-7f2781c67876 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:50:00 -0400 UC San Diego's initiative for combating the opioid crisis with AI
研究强调多动症药物对阿片类药物使用障碍孕妇的益处在美国，孕妇阿片类药物过量服用的情况处于历史最高水平，尽管总体数量正在改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-highlights-benefits-of-ADHD-medications-for-pregnant-病人-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-highlights-benefits-of-ADHD-medications-for-pregnant-病人-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5efb171-d9f3-419d-bcf4-5cf7e0dcf4f6 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:41:00 -0400 Study highlights benefits of ADHD medications for pregnant patients with opioid use disorder
对风湿病患者进行身体活动的新见解2024 年 EULAR 大会上的 HPR 摘要会议专门探讨了利用运动治疗风湿病和肌肉骨骼疾病 (RMD) 的益处，以及实际实施中面临的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-physical-activity-adoption-for-rheumatic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-physical-activity-adoption-for-rheumatic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36966d1a-d049-43fe-9f30-1f6e7711a1d0 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:33:00 -0400 New insights into physical activity adoption for rheumatic patients
新的心理疗法有望减少老年退伍军人的慢性疼痛由加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心和美国退伍军人事务办公室领导的一项新研究发现，通过一种新开发的心理疗法可以显着减轻老年人的慢性疼痛，该疗法通过面对过去可能加剧疼痛症状的创伤和压力相关情绪来发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-psychotherapy-shows-promise-in-reducing-chronic-pain-for-older-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-psychotherapy-shows-promise-in-reducing-chronic-pain-for-older-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c6ceb77-bee5-4229-b5d1-42524b4dca6a Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:24:00 -0400 New psychotherapy shows promise in reducing chronic pain for older veterans
体力活动和认知训练可以改善患有唐氏综合症的成年人的情绪一项新研究发现，体力活动和认知训练可以提高患有唐氏综合症的成年人的生活满意度和情绪水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Physical-activity-and-cognitive-training-can-improve-mood-for-adults-with-Downs-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Physical-activity-and-cognitive-training-can-improve-mood-for-adults-with-Downs-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=165d7435-5488-42bb-b72c-0f1bb9570ef5 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:16:00 -0400 Physical activity and cognitive training can improve mood for adults with Down's syndrome
系统性红斑狼疮中糖皮质激素的剂量减少糖皮质激素是治疗系统性红斑狼疮（SLE）的主要药物。但由于长期的不良影响，减少剂量正成为治疗目标管理目标的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Dose-reduction-of-glucocorticoids-in-systemic-lupus-erythematosus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Dose-reduction-of-glucocorticoids-in-systemic-lupus-erythematosus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae3c94b-471b-4c83-b1b5-3a234c993de4 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:09:00 -0400 Dose reduction of glucocorticoids in systemic lupus erythematosus
关于 RA 致病性巨噬细胞血液前体的新见解组织巨噬细胞的确切起源和前体分化途径仍存在争议。在 2024 年 EULAR（欧洲风湿病协会联盟）大会上，新的工作揭示了致病性组织巨噬细胞的血液前体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-blood-precursors-of-pathogenic-macrophages-in-RA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-blood-precursors-of-pathogenic-macrophages-in-RA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e30853-6501-497d-8175-b065a517c5b3 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:04:00 -0400 New insights into blood precursors of pathogenic macrophages in RA
